kot_cards.name: Acid Attack
kot_cards.effect: Add [attack] to your roll

kot_cards.name: Alien Metabolism
kot_cards.effect: Buying Power cards costs you 1 less [Energy].

kot_cards.name: Alpha Monster
kot_cards.effect: Gain 1[Star] when you Roll at least one [attack].

kot_cards.name: Apartment Building
kot_cards.effect: + 3[Star]

kot_cards.name: Armor Plating
kot_cards.effect: Do not lose 1[health] when you lose exactly 1[health]
kot_cards.footnote: (Damages from [attack] and each Card effect are considered separately)

kot_cards.name: Background Dweller
kot_cards.effect: You can always reroll any [3] you have.

kot_cards.name: Burrowing
kot_cards.effect: Add [attack] to your roll when you are in Tokyo. When you Yield Tokyo, the Monster taking it loses 1[health]

kot_cards.name: Camouflage
kot_cards.effect: If you lose [health], roll a die for each [health] you lost. Each [heart] reduces the loss by 1[heart]
kot_cards.footnote: (applicable to damages from both [attack] and Card effect)

kot_cards.name: Commuter Train
kot_cards.effect: + 2[Star]

kot_cards.name: Complete Destruction
kot_cards.effect: If you roll [1][2][3][Heart][Attack][Energy] gain 9[Star] in addition to the regular results.

kot_cards.name: Corner Store
kot_cards.effect: + 1[Star]

kot_cards.name: Dedicated News Team
kot_cards.effect: Gain 1[Star] whenever you buy a Power card.

kot_cards.name: Drop from High Altitude
kot_cards.effect: + 2[Star] and take control of Tokyo if you don't already control it.
kot_cards.footnote: (player choose to take control either City & Bay if both are occupied)

kot_cards.name: Eater of the Dead
kot_cards.effect: Gain 3[Star] every time a monster's [Heart] goes to 0.

kot_cards.name: Energize
kot_cards.effect: + 9[Energy]

kot_cards.name: Energy Hoarder
kot_cards.effect: You gain 1[Star] for every 6[Energy] you have at the end of your turn.

kot_cards.name: Evacuation Orders
kot_cards.effect: All other monsters lose 5[Star].

kot_cards.name: Evacuation Orders
kot_cards.effect: All other monsters lose 5[Star].

kot_cards.name: Even Bigger
kot_cards.effect: +2[health] when you buy this card. Your maximum [health] is increased to 12 as long as you own this card

kot_cards.name: Extra Head
kot_cards.effect: You get 1 extra die.

kot_cards.name: Extra Head
kot_cards.effect: You get 1 extra die.

kot_cards.name: Fire Blast
kot_cards.effect: All other monsters lose 2[health]

kot_cards.name: Fire Breathing
kot_cards.effect: Your neighbors lose 1[health] when you roll at least one [attack]
kot_cards.footnote: (neighbor Monsters lose[health] even if they are in the same place as you)

kot_cards.name: Freeze Time
kot_cards.effect: On a turn where you roll [1][1][1] or more, you can take another turn with one less die.

kot_cards.name: Frenzy
kot_cards.effect: Take another turn after this one

kot_cards.name: Friend of Children
kot_cards.effect: When you gain any [Energy] gain 1 extra [Energy].
kot_cards.footnote: (applicable to [energy] gained from Roll or Card effects which gain [energy])

kot_cards.name: Gas Refinery
kot_cards.effect: +2[star] and all other monsters lose 3[health]

kot_cards.name: Giant Brain
kot_cards.effect: You have 1 extra die roll each turn

kot_cards.name: Gourmet
kot_cards.effect: When rolling [1][1][1] or more gain 2 extra [Star].

kot_cards.name: Heal
kot_cards.effect: +2[health]

kot_cards.name: Healing Ray
kot_cards.effect: You can use your [heart] to make other monsters gain [health]. Each monster must pay you 2[energy] (or 1[energy] if it' their last one) for each [health] they gain this way]
kot_cards.footnote: (can use it outside Tokyo to heal Monster inside Tokyo; can use it inside to heal Monster outside)

kot_cards.name: Herbivore
kot_cards.effect: Gain 1[star] at the end of your turn if you don't make anyone lose [health]

kot_cards.name: Herd Culler
kot_cards.effect: You can change one of your dice to a [1] each turn.

kot_cards.name: High Altitude Bombing
kot_cards.effect: All monsters (including you) lose 3[health]

kot_cards.name: It Has a Child
kot_cards.effect: If you reach 0[health] discard all your cards and lose all you [star]. Gain 10[health] and continue playing outside Tokyo

kot_cards.name: Jet Fighters
kot_cards.effect: +5[star] -4[health]

kot_cards.name: Jets
kot_cards.effect: You don't lose [health] if you decide to yield Tokyo

kot_cards.name: Made in a Lab
kot_cards.effect: During the Buy Power cards step, you can peek at the top card of the deck and buy it or put it back on top of the deck.

kot_cards.name: Metamorph
kot_cards.effect: At the end of your turn you can discard any [keep] cards you have to gain their full cost in [energy].

kot_cards.name: Mimic
kot_cards.effect: Choose a [keep] card any monster has in play and put a Mimic token on it. This card counts as a duplicate of that card as if you had just bought it. Spend 1[energy] at ther start of your turn to move the Mimic token and change the card you ar mimicking
kot_cards.footnote: (Can mimic own card; take back mimic token if the copied Card is discarded)

kot_cards.name: Battery Monster
kot_cards.effect: When you buy Battery Monster, put 6[energy] on it from the bank. At the start of each turn take 2[energy] off and add them to your pool. When there are no [energy] left discard this card.

kot_cards.name: National Guard
kot_cards.effect: +2[star] -2[health]

kot_cards.name: Nova Breath
kot_cards.effect: your [attack] smash all other monsters

kot_cards.name: Nuclear Power Plant
kot_cards.effect: +2[star] +3[health]

kot_cards.name: Omnivore
kot_cards.effect: When you roll at least [1][2][3], gain 2[star]. You can use these dice in other combinations.

kot_cards.name: Opportunist
kot_cards.effect: Whenever a power card is revealed you have the option of buying it immediately
kot_cards.footnote: (if card is mimic-ed, first Monster clockwise from current Player can choose whether to buy first

kot_cards.name: Parasitic Tentacles
kot_cards.effect: You can buy Power cards form other Monsters. Pay them the [energy] cost.

kot_cards.name: Plot Twist
kot_cards.effect: Before resolving your dice you may change one die to any result. Discard when used.

kot_cards.name: Poison Quills
kot_cards.effect: When you roll [2][2][2] or more, add [attack][attack] to your roll

kot_cards.name: Poison Spit
kot_cards.effect: Give Poison token to each monser you smash with your [attack]. At the end of their turn, Monsters lose 1[health] for each poison token they have on them. A poison token can be discarded by using a [heart] instead of gaining 1[health]
kot_cards.footnote: (tokens stay w/ Monsters even if Card is diskcarded; Monster in Tokyo can't use [heart] to remove tokens)

kot_cards.name: Psychic Probe
kot_cards.effect: You can reroll a die of your choice after the last roll of each other monster. If you reroll [heart] discard this card.

kot_cards.name: Rapid Healing
kot_cards.effect: Spend 2[energy] at any time to gain 1[health]
kot_cards.footnote: (allowed to use even after a Player completed 3 rolls and before the Roll is resolved; usable in Tokyo)

kot_cards.name: Regeneration
kot_cards.effect: When you gain [health], gain 1 extra [health]

kot_cards.name: Rooting for the Underdog
kot_cards.effect: At the end of a turn if you have the fewest [Star] gain 1 [Star].
kot_cards.footnote: (no [star] if tied fewest; at the end of your turn)

kot_cards.name: Shrink Ray
kot_cards.effect: Give a Shrink Ray token to each monseter you smash with your [attack]. Athe the beginning of their turn, Monsters roll 1 less dice for each Shrink Ray token they have on them. A Shrink ray token can be discarded by using a [heart] instead of gaining 1[health]
kot_cards.footnote: (tokens stay even if Card is discarded; Monster in Tokyo can't use [heart] to remove tokens)

kot_cards.name: Skyscraper
kot_cards.effect: +4[star]

kot_cards.name: Smoke Cloud
kot_cards.effect: Place 3 smoke tokens on this card. Spen 1 smoke token for an extra roll. Discard this card when all smoke counters are spent.
kot_cards.footnote: (can use all 3 charges in one turn)

kot_cards.name: Solar Powered
kot_cards.effect: At the end of your turn gain 1[Energy] if you have no [Energy].

kot_cards.name: Spiked Tail
kot_cards.effect: If you roll at least one [attack], add [attack] to your roll

kot_cards.name: Stretchy
kot_cards.effect: Before resolving your dice, you can spend 2[energy] to change one of your dice to any result.

kot_cards.name: Tanks
kot_cards.effect: +4[star] -3[health]

kot_cards.name: Telepath
kot_cards.effect: Spend 1[energy] to get 1 extra die roll

kot_cards.name: Urbavore
kot_cards.effect: gain 1 extra [star] when beginning your turn in Tokyo. If your are in Tokyo and you roll at least one [attack] add [attack] to your roll

kot_cards.name: Vast Storm
kot_cards.effect: +2[star] and all other monsters lose 1[energy] for every 2[energy] they have

kot_cards.name: We're Only Making It Stronger
kot_cards.effect: When you lose 2[health] or more gain 1[energy]

kot_cards.name: Wings
kot_cards.effect: Spend 2[energy] to not lose [health] this turn
kot_cards.footnote: (allowed to use even after a Player completed 3 rolls and before the Roll is resolved)
